I'm finished. $, kaikai long nait $$$$, May I have a glass of water? $ - $$, I gat sampela rum? $$, Inap mi lukim menyu $ - $$, plis? $$$$, How much is this? $$$ - $$$$, Excuse me $, waiter? $, supper $$$$, Sori $$ - $$$, weta? $$$, Mi no kaikai mit. $$$, Mi laikim wanpela kap kofi? $$$, Mi laikim wanpela glas wara? $, kaikai long moningtaim $$$, Is there a local specialty? $$$ - $$$$, May I have a cup of coffee? $$ - $$$, Mi kaikai pinis. $$ - $$$, Is there a house specialty? $$ - $$$, Inap mi lukim menyu plis? $$$ - $$$$, Can I look at the menu $ - $$, please? $$$$, Is breakfast/supper included? $$, Hamas long dispela? $$$ - $$$$, Mi laik baim bil blong kaikai bilong mi. $, I am a vegetarian. $$
